sections.heading: Procedure;
sections.text: applicable law; power to sell and transfer assets.

sections.heading: Federal
sections.text:
Deposit Insurance Corporation may act as receiver or liquidator of closed bank

having insured deposits; no bond required.

sections.heading: Acceptance
sections.text:
of appointment as receiver or liquidator; possession of and title to assets,

business and property vests in Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

sections.heading: Enforcement
sections.text:
of individual liability of stockholders or members and directors or managers of

closed bank.

sections.heading: Payment
sections.text: of insured deposits; subrogation.

sections.heading: Loans
sections.text: to closed banks by Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation; sale of assets to it.

sections.heading: Commissioner
sections.text:
to furnish copies of examinations and reports to Federal Deposit Insurance

Corporation.

sections.heading: Deposit
sections.text: of books, papers and records with Commissioner upon final liquidation.

sections.heading: Destruction
sections.text: of records of liquidated insolvent banks.

sections.heading: Termination
sections.text:
of trusteeship under security instruments upon insolvency; appointment of

successor trustee by petition to district court or pursuant to security

instrument.

sections.heading: Petition
sections.text:
for appointment of successor trustee by district court: Order directing service

of notice.

sections.heading: Petition
sections.text: for appointment of successor trustee: Publication and contents of notice.

sections.heading: Appointment
sections.text: of successor trustee when no objection made.

sections.heading: Hearing
sections.text: on objections to appointment of successor trustee; appeal from order.

sections.heading: Recordation
sections.text: of order appointing successor trustee.

sections.heading: Petition
sections.text: and order may relate to all instruments in which former trustee was named.

sections.heading: Provisions
sections.text: additional to other remedies.

sections.heading: Validation
sections.text: of sales by liquidator under security instruments giving power of sale.

sections.heading: Report
sections.text:
of banks under liquidation: Contents; filing with Secretary of State;

publication.

sections.heading: Conditions
sections.text: under which banks may reopen.

sections.heading: Conditions
sections.text: under which bank may reorganize before actual dissolution.
